timeline.message: Actually, lets fix that param name and do another method

timeline.bodyText: fyi i recently find out this is actually a registry tracker but written much like one for dimension (as proguard now reveals one more generic-setup method)
timeline.author: liach
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -252,3 +252,38 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_310 net/minecraft/client/MinecraftClient

+		ARG 0 session
+		ARG 1 dimensionTracker

replies.bodyText:
I can't exactly figure out what it means. It seems to be a combo of ServerResourceManager, resource pack manager and another thing.
IntegratedResourceManager was my first thought
replies.author: i509VCB

timeline.bodyText: more like data pack selection for a server? also not really resource related but more server related, as the lists' element types are like strings
timeline.author: liach

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            		ARG 0 dimensionTracker
          
          
            
            		ARG 0 registryTracker
